InteropTopicSubcrParameter.name: InteropTopicSubcrParameter
InteropTopicSubcrParameter.description: Represents the parameters added to an interoperability topic subscription.

InteropTopicSubscriptionId.description: The interoperability topic subscription for which the parameters are added.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic subscription parameter record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic subscription parameter record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the interoperability topic subscription parameter record.

ParameterName.description: The name of the parameter added to the interoperability topic subscription.

ParameterValue.description: The value of the parameter added to the interoperability topic subscription.
